ess-beta-metadata.label: Gross median weekly pay
ess-beta-metadata.subtitle: Average weekly pay based on where people live
ess-beta-metadata.sourceOrg: Office for National Statistics|Northern Ireland Statistics and Research Agency
ess-beta-metadata.longDescription: This indicator shows the average (median) weekly pay based on where people live, in the UK, for a pay period that included a specified date in April 2008 to April 2024.
ess-beta-metadata.caveats:
For Great Britain data, 2024 estimates are provisional and relate to the pay period that includes 17 April 2024. Estimates for 2023 have been revised and relate to the pay period that includes 19 April 2023.

The country level figure for Northern Ireland has been sourced from Nomis rather than NISRA. This is to allow for confidence intervals.

Northern Ireland Local Government District data has been sourced from the [NISRA Data Portal](https://data.nisra.gov.uk/).
